snippet: On Tuesday night, before the fair opened for big collectors and VIPs at the Miami Beach Convention Center on Wednesday morning, the big event was the opening of the exhibition "Bill Viola: Liber Insularum" at the Museum of Contemporary Art, North...
abstract: On Tuesday night, before the fair opened for big collectors and VIPs at the Miami Beach Convention Center on Wednesday morning, the big event was the opening of the exhibition "Bill Viola: Liber Insularum" at the Museum of Contemporary Art, North Miami, where guests encountered a work reminiscent of Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: For Some Visitors to Art Basel Miami Beach, a Reminder of Sandy's Ravages

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Museum of Contemporary Art North Miami
